articles.title: เอา TESLA ไปซ่อมนอกจากศูนย์นี้ 'ประกันหลุด !'
articles.excerpt: มีกรณีผู้ใช้รถ TESLA เกิดอุบัติเหตุ เคลมประกันรถยนต์ชั้น 1 ได้ทราบข้อมูลว่า ถ้านำรถเข้าซ่อมกับศูนย์ที่ไม่ได้รับการรับรองโดย tesla ประกันคุณภาพตัวรถจะขาดทันที! .
articles.summary:
มีกรณีผู้ใช้รถ TESLA เกิดอุบัติเหตุ เคลมประกันรถยนต์ชั้น 1 ได้ทราบข้อมูลว่า ถ้านำรถเข้าซ่อมกับศูนย์ที่ไม่ได้รับการรับรองโดย tesla ประกันคุณภาพตัวรถจะขาดทันที!
.
Priceza Money จึงได้สอบถามไปยัง tesla official ว่าเรื่องราวเป็นอย่างไร ทาง tesla แจ้งว่า
.
'ถ้าหากเจ้าของรถนำรถเข้าไปซ่อมกับศูนย์อื่นๆนอกเหนือจากศูนย์ที่ได้รับการรับรองโดย tesla แล้วทางศูนย์นั้นๆซ่อมหรือเปลี่ยนอุปกรณ์ชิ้นส่วนรถยนต์ tesla จะถือว่าประกันคุณภาพตัวรถส่วนนั้นๆขาดทันที'
.
โดยปัจจุบัน ศูนย์ซ่อมรถยนต์ tesla ที่ได้รับการรับรองจาก tesla official มีเพียงแค่ 'MMS Bosch Car Service สาขาพัฒนาการ' เท่านั้น ใครที่เป็นเจ้าของรถยนต์ tesla และต้องการเข้าไปซ่อมที่ศูนย์ MMS Bosch Car Service เราแนะนำว่า
1.

articles.title: Tesla Changed Tactics And Now Displays Prices After Tax Credit
articles.author: Mark Kane
articles.excerpt: Another day brought another change in Tesla's information strategy, as the company website now displays prices after the federal tax credit.
articles.summary:
Another day brought another change in Tesla's information strategy, as the company's main Model 3 and Model Y websites now display prices after the federal tax credit.
 
Because 
the two models qualify for the $7,500 incentive
, such a presentation of prices might attract more customers who will perceive the 
Model 3
 or 
Model Y
 as more affordable.
 
Starting price after federal tax credit:
 
 
Tesla Model 3: $32,740
 
Tesla Model Y: $39,990
 
 
Once one enters the configurator, the vehicle price is displayed normally, and later all the details are listed in the payment section.

articles.title: Tesla Stock Keeps Rising. It's Playing Chess While Other Play Checkers, Says Analyst.
articles.author: Al Root
articles.excerpt: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives raises his price target on Tesla stock to $300 a share from $215. He rates shares a Buy.
articles.summary:
Tesla stock has risen for 10 consecutive days. It looks like 11 is a foregone conclusion. A big deal is a big reason, but Wall Street also is helping.

Tesla was rising 6.2% in premarket trading. S&P 500 futures were flat. Nasdaq Composite futures gained 0.1%.

Shares of Tesla shot up Thursday evening after General Motors (GM) and Tesla announced an agreement that will have GM's electric-vehicle drivers charging at Tesla's supercharger network. It's a similar deal Tesla struck with Ford (F). RBC analyst Tom Narayan wrote Thursday he expects a similar announcement from Stellantis (STLA).

articles.title: Tesla FINALLY Recalls Model Y For Steering Wheels Falling Off
articles.author: Jacob Oliva
articles.excerpt: Tesla has issued a recall for 137 units of the hot-selling Model Y, manufactured between 2022 and 2023. The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) documents the issue through a report…
articles.summary:
Tesla
 
 
 
 
Tesla
 
 
 
 
Tesla
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Fortunately, there have been no reported accidents related to this issue thus far. Nevertheless, Tesla will be offering free inspections and reinforcement to 137 vehicles. Users can avail of these services at Tesla service centers as needed.
The Model Y has already been subject to several recalls this year. In February, the company was required to issue a recall for nearly 363,000 vehicles due to concerns 
regarding its Full Self Driving software
.

articles.title: Tesla rips a big gain with analysts highlighting Supercharger revenue potential
articles.author: Clark Schultz
articles.excerpt: Tesla (TSLA) shot higher in early trading on Friday and could be on its way to an 11th straight day of gains
articles.summary:
Spencer Platt
 
Tesla (
NASDAQ:
TSLA
) shot higher in early trading on Friday and could be on its way to an 11th straight day of gains.
 
Following the late announcement on Thursday on a battery vehicle partnership with General Motors (
GM
), the electric
 vehicle stock was added to the Best Ideas List at Wedbush Securities and given a higher price target of $300.
 
Analyst Dan Ives and team believe Tesla (
TSLA
) is on track to hit its 1.8M unit delivery bogey for the year and should see margins ramp back up into FY24.

articles.title: Tesla's Hot Streak Spurs First Price Target Boost: 'Musk Playing Chess While Other Automakers Playing Checkers'
articles.author: Shanthi Rexaline
articles.excerpt: Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) shares have been on a tear since May and they have risen in each of the past 10 sessions. As the stock overshoots the pr...
articles.summary:
Tesla, Inc.
 (NASDAQ:TSLA) shares have been on a tear since May and they have risen in each of the past 10 sessions. As the stock overshoots the price target by sell-side firms, a Wedbush analyst became the first to react to its recent spike.
 
The Tesla Analyst:
 
Dan Ives
 reiterated an Outperform rating and upped the price target for the stock from $215 to $300. The analyst also added Tesla back to Wedbush's best ideas list.
 
The Tesla Thesis:
 The sum-of-the-parts story for Tesla now further comes into play with its supercharger network, energy business, AI-driven autonomous path, battery ecosystem, and increased production scale/scope globally, Ives said.

articles.title: Tesla's Hot Streak Spurs First Price Target Boost: 'Musk Playing Chess While Other Automakers Playing Checkers'
articles.author: Shanthi Rexaline
articles.summary:
Tesla, Inc. TSLA shares have been on a tear since May and they have risen in each of the past 10 sessions. As the stock overshoots the price target by sell-side firms, a Wedbush analyst became the first to react to its recent spike.

The Tesla Analyst: Dan Ives reiterated an Outperform rating and upped the price target for the stock from $215 to $300. The analyst also added Tesla back to Wedbush's best ideas list.

The Tesla Thesis: The sum-of-the-parts story for Tesla now further comes into play with its supercharger network, energy business, AI-driven autonomous path, battery ecosystem, and increased production scale/scope globally, Ives said.

articles.title: TESLA MODEL 3 สีรุ้ง รถยนต์ไฟฟ้าพาเพลิน!
articles.author: Thairath
articles.excerpt: Tesla ประเทศไทย จัด Model 3 สีรุ้ง คันแรกในเอเชียตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ กับแคมเปญ Drive With Pride
articles.summary:
ยานยนต์
รถยนต์ไฟฟ้า
ไทยรัฐออนไลน์
Tesla Thailand บริษัทผลิตรถยนต์ไฟฟ้าของอเมริกา เปิดตัวแคมเปญ 'Drive With Pride' วางเป้าหมายเฉลิมฉลองความหลากหลายในสังคม แคมเปญนี้ มีการนำตัวรถ Tesla โมเดล 3 สีรุ้งคันแรกในเอเชียตะวันออกเฉียงใต้ เพื่อสร้างแรงบันดาลใจให้กับผู้คน เชิญชวนให้มีส่วนร่วมในการเปลี่ยนแปลงและขับเคลื่อนอนาคต ทั้งนี้ Tesla แจ้งว่า บริษัทฯ มีความมุ่งมั่นที่จะส่งเสริมให้สังคมมีความครอบคลุมด้านการเดินทางด้วยยานพาหนะไฟฟ้ามากขึ้น แคมเปญ "Drive with Pride" เชิญร่วมแบ่งปันเรื่องราวและประสบการณ์กับร

articles.author: Al Root
articles.excerpt: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives raises his price target on Tesla stock to $300 a share from $215. He rates shares a Buy.
articles.summary:
Tesla stock has risen for 10 consecutive days. It looks like 11 is a foregone conclusion. A big deal is a big reason, but Wall Street also is helping.

Tesla was rising 6.2% in premarket trading. S&P 500 futures were flat. Nasdaq Composite futures gained 0.1%.

Shares of Tesla shot up Thursday evening after General Motors (GM) and Tesla announced an agreement that will have GM's electric-vehicle drivers charging at Tesla's supercharger network. It's a similar deal Tesla struck with Ford (F). RBC analyst Tom Narayan wrote Thursday he expects a similar announcement from Stellantis (STLA).

articles.title: Tesla Stock Leaps On GM Charging Deal. Analyst Calls Move 'Game, Set, Match' For Market Control.
articles.author: KIT NORTON
articles.excerpt: Tesla's deal with GM follows a similar agreement with Ford.
articles.summary:
Tesla (TSLA) and General Motors (GM) announced Thursday evening that GM will gain access to the Tesla supercharger network in North America starting next year. TSLA and GM shares jumped early Friday.

The deal between Tesla and General Motors gives GM owners access to 12,000 superchargers via an adapter next year. In 2025, GM will begin using Tesla's charging port, the North American Charging Standard (NACS) connector, in their electric vehicles. This follows a similar deal between Tesla and Ford (F) to give Ford customers access to the Tesla supercharger network.

articles.title: Tesla Owners Put The Most Miles On Their EVs, Porsche Owners The Least
articles.author: Sebastien Bell
articles.excerpt: Tesla Owners Put The Most Miles On Their EVs, Porsche Owners The Least
articles.summary:
Even so, electric vehicles are driven 29% less than your average gas-powered car in US 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"


The average owner of a three-year-old EV in America drives around 9,059 miles (14,579 km) in a year, a new iSeeCars 
study reveals
. That's over 3,000 miles (4,828 km) or 29 percent less than the average internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicle owner drives in a year.
 
Even the owners of the most driven three-year-old 
EVs on
 the road today drive less than the 12,758 miles (20,532 km) completed by the average owner of a three-year-old ICE vehicle.

articles.title: Tesla Stock Has 25% Upside, and EVs Are Just a Part of It, Says Analyst
articles.author: Al Root
articles.excerpt: Piper Sandler analyst Alexander Potter has a $280 price target on Tesla stock, and the electric-vehicle business only accounts for $135 of it. There's...
articles.summary:
Tesla stock isn't cheap when considering the potential for its car business alone. That shouldn't surprise anyone.

That's the conclusion from Piper Sandler analyst Alexander Potter. Still, he's a Tesla (ticker: TSLA) bull, rating shares at Buy with a $280 price target. That's more than 25% higher than the current market price.

It isn't hard to see his point. Tesla stock is worth some $680 billion. That's almost three times the market capitalization of Toyota Motor (TM), the second-most-valuable auto maker on the planet, and one of its largest and most consistently profitable.

articles.title: Musk est prêt à partager FSD, mais il n'y a pas de repas gratuit dans le monde
articles.excerpt: Dans un discours public antérieur, Yu Chengdong a de nouveau mentionné le pilote automatique de Tesla. "Dans le domaine de la conduite autonome, Tesla est le plus puissant actuellement." "Nous avons…
articles.summary:
Dans un discours public antérieur, Yu Chengdong a de nouveau mentionné le pilote automatique de Tesla.


 "Dans le domaine de la conduite autonome, Tesla est le plus puissant actuellement."


 "Nous avons dépassé en termes de cockpits intelligents, donc en termes de technologie de conduite autonome, je suis responsable de dire que notre technologie doit les surpasser de loin (Tesla)."


 "Y a-t-il une seconde dans mon dictionnaire, ce doit être le numéro un, et ce numéro un doit être le numéro un dans le monde.

articles.title: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar puestos de carga de Tesla
articles.author: TOM KRISHER
articles.excerpt: DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según el acuerdo anunciado por las dos automotrices el jueves.
articles.summary:
DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según el acuerdo anunciado por las dos automotrices el jueves.

Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, la clavija que conecta un auto eléctrico a una estación de carga.

GM se une a Ford en los cambios en sus vehículos eléctricos para trabajar con unos 12.000 de los aproximadamente 17.000 cargadores de Tesla. Además, las dos automotrices de Detroit están presionando para convertir el conector de Tesla en el estándar de la industria.

articles.summary:
DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según el acuerdo anunciado por las dos automotrices el jueves.

Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, la clavija que conecta un auto eléctrico a una estación de carga.

GM se une a Ford en los cambios en sus vehículos eléctricos para trabajar con unos 12.000 de los aproximadamente 17.000 cargadores de Tesla. Además, las dos automotrices de Detroit están presionando para convertir el conector de Tesla en el estándar de la industria.

articles.title: Стоит ли сейчас покупать акции Tesla?
articles.author: Investing.com
articles.excerpt: Стоит ли сейчас покупать акции Tesla?
articles.summary:
Investing.com — В четверг акции компании Tesla вновь ускорили рост, закрывшись на 1,47% выше и оставаясь в плюсе 9-ю сессию подряд, отметив новый годовой максимум.

С начала текущего восходящего тренда после минимума $152,37 24 апреля, акции Tesla выросли более чем на 50%, достигнув вчерашнего максимума $228,28.

С начала года TSLA выросла более чем на 100%.

Что касается вчерашнего роста, мы бы отметили, что акции получили поддержку федерального правительства США, подтвердившего, что автомобили Tesla имеют право на налоговый кредит в размере $7500, а также правительства Монголии, которое заявило, что готово принять у себя завод по производству батарей Tesla.

articles.title: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar red de carga de Tesla
articles.author: TOM KRISHER
articles.excerpt: DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán utilizar gran parte de la extensa red de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año. Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, el enchufe que conecta un vehículo eléctrico a una estación de carga.
articles.summary:
DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán utilizar gran parte de la extensa red de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año. Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, el enchufe que conecta un vehículo eléctrico a una estación de carga.

De esta forma, GM se une a Ford para que sus vehículos eléctricos funcionen con casi 12.000 de los aproximadamente 17.000 cargadores de Tesla, y ambas automotrices de Detroit están presionando para que el conector de Tesla sea el estándar de la industria.

articles.excerpt: Tesla's FSD beta technology is exciting to many people, but many more just don't really seem to know about it or care. Musk says that could change instantly.

articles.title: E-Autos von GM dürfen künftig Supercharger von Tesla nutzen
articles.author: N-Tv Nachrichten
articles.excerpt: Der Börsen-Tag
articles.summary:
Der Börsen-Tag
 
E-Autos von GM dürfen künftig Supercharger von Tesla nutzen
 
 
 
 
09.06.2023, 07:35 Uhr
 
 
 
Elektroautos von 
General Motors (GM)
 sollen künftig die
 gleiche Lade-Hardware wie Tesla
 verwenden. Wie GM mitteilte, hat Tesla zugestimmt, GM-Kunden ab dem nächsten Jahr Zugang zu 12.000 Tesla-Schnellladestationen, den sogenannten Superchargern, zu gewähren. Mit diesem Schritt würde GM seinen Kunden 
besseren Zugang zu Ladestationen 
ermöglichen. Zudem würde Teslas Lade-Technologie weiter als Industriestandard etabliert.

articles.title: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar puestos de carga de Tesla
articles.author: TOM KRISHER
articles.excerpt: DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear...
articles.summary:
GM se une a Ford en los cambios en sus vehículos eléctricos para trabajar con unos 12.000 de los aproximadamente 17.000 cargadores de Tesla. Además, las dos automotrices de Detroit están presionando para convertir el conector de Tesla en el estándar de la industria.

La directora general de GM, Mary Barra, y su homólogo de Tesla, Elon Musk, realizaron el anuncio durante una conversación en Twitter Spaces.

Se produce dos semanas después de que el director general de Ford, Jim Farley, se uniera a Musk para anunciar que los autos eléctricos de su firma tendrán acceso a gran parte de la red de carga de Tesla, la más grande del país.

articles.title: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar puestos de carga de Tesla

articles.summary:
DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según el acuerdo anunciado por las dos automotrices el jueves.
Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, la clavija que conecta un auto eléctrico a una estación de carga.
GM se une a Ford en los cambios en sus vehículos eléctricos para trabajar con unos 12.000 de los aproximadamente 17.000 cargadores de Tesla. Además, las dos automotrices de Detroit están presionando para convertir el conector de Tesla en el estándar de la industria.

articles.title: Is Tesla Stock a Buy, Sell or Hold? Here's My Call.
articles.author: David Moadel
articles.excerpt: InvestorPlace - Stock Market News, Stock Advice & Trading Tips
articles.summary:
Electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) certainly uses artificial intelligence (AI) to its advantage. However, this doesn't automatically mean TSLA stock should be classified as an AI stock. Nevertheless, Tesla's loyal investors can remain optimistic about the future prospects of the company and the stock.

On May 12, I declared, 'It's definitely not too late to start a long position in Tesla stock.' The stock has rallied since then, so I feel pretty good about my bullish call.

Am I prepared to stand by that call now, though? Keep reading to discover the latest buzz about Tesla and whether it's bullish, bearish or neither.

articles.title: GM Too Joins Tesla Charging Network: Would Other Automakers Follow?
articles.author: Mohit Oberoi
articles.excerpt: GM cars would be able to charge at 12,000 Tesla Superchargers by spring next year and GM would integrate Tesla's NACS in its future EVs
articles.summary:
General Motors (NYSE: GM) cars would be able to charge at 12,000 Tesla Superchargers by spring next year and GM would integrate Tesla's North American Charging Standard (NACS) in its future EVs to enable seamless charging at Superchargers.

The deal was announced by Tesla CEO Elon Musk and GM CEO Mary Barra in a Twitter Spaces interaction.

Spaces discussion with Mary Barra, CEO of @GM! @mtbarra https://t.co/mWXgvOmWi2

— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) June 8, 2023

Just about two weeks back, Tesla and Ford also announced a similar deal for charging network.

articles.title: Гигафабрика Tesla в Шанхае резко увеличила поставки автомобилей в мае
articles.excerpt: В мае 2023 года гигафабрика Tesla в Шанхае поставила 77 695 автомобилей, что на 142 проц. больше в годовом выражении. Об этом сообщили в компании Tesla.
articles.summary:
20 августа 2022 года, Шанхай, Китай. Гигафабрика Tesla в районе Линьган пилотной зоны свободной торговли в Шанхае /Восточный Китай/. /Фото: Синьхуа/


Шанхай, 5 июня /Синьхуа/ -- В мае 2023 года гигафабрика Tesla в Шанхае поставила 77 695 автомобилей, что на 142 проц. больше в годовом выражении. Об этом сообщили в компании Tesla.


Генеральный директор Tesla Илон Маск в начале этого месяца нанес визит в Китай, в ходе которого посетил шанхайский завод Tesla и выразил удовлетворение эффективностью производства и качеством продукции.

articles.title: Tesla rallies again as Spain joins the Gigafactory target list (NASDAQ:TSLA)
articles.author: Clark Schultz
articles.excerpt: A report from a Spanish publication on Thursday indicated Tesla (TSLA) is in talks with the local government of Valencia about building a $4.8B electric vehicle factory. Read more.
articles.summary:
Tramino/iStock Unreleased via Getty Images
 
A report from a Spanish publication on Thursday indicated Tesla (
NASDAQ:
TSLA
) is in talks with the local government of Valencia about building a $4.8B electric vehicle factory in the region. For its part, the Valencia government has confirmed that it is negotiating
 with an unnamed automaker for a potential large investment in the region. Tesla has not commented on the development.
 
Tesla (
TSLA
) already has plans for a 
new gigafactory
 in Monterry, Mexico that is expected to be twice the size of the factory in Austin, Texas.

articles.title: Charger Tesla Juga Bisa Dipakai buat Isi Daya Mobil Listrik Ini
articles.author: Aulia Damayanti
articles.excerpt: General Motors (GM.N) mengumumkan telah melakukan kesepakatan dengan Tesla (TSLA.O) berkaitan dengan kerja sama pengisian daya mobil listrik.
articles.summary:
Jakarta
 - 
General Motors (GM.N) mengumumkan telah melakukan kesepakatan dengan 
Tesla
 (TSLA.O) berkaitan dengan kerja sama pengisian daya mobil listrik. Dengan kesepakatan itu, mobil listrik GM nantinya bisa mengisi daya di Tesla Superchargers.
Kesepakatan ini diumumkan oleh CEO GM Mary Barra dan kepala Tesla Elon Musk dalam acara Twitter Spaces. Langkah GM ini mengikuti produsen mobil listrik Ford yang lebih dulu melakukan kesepakatan dengan Tesla Mei lalu.
GM mengatakan atas kerja sama itu, perusahaan bisa menghemat US$ 400 juta.

articles.title: How did Nikola Tesla change the way we use energy?
articles.author: William Harris
articles.excerpt: Who made it possible to light up your home at night? Thomas Edison, right? Yes, but without the work of Nikola Tesla, we would be living in a different world.
articles.summary:
While Edison toiled to commercialize his electric lamp, Tesla worked through a problem that had intrigued him since he was a student at the Joanneum Polytechnic School in Graz, Austria. While a student there, Tesla saw a demonstration of a Gramme 
dynamo
. A dynamo is a generator that uses a 
commutator
 -- contacts mounted on the machine's shaft -- to produce direct current instead of alternating current. Tesla mentioned to his instructor that it might be possible to do away with the commutator, which sparked horribly as the dynamo operated.

Tesla Model S hatchback
The next few years of Tesla Motors are laid out - including solar power, pu

articles.title: Tesla Pulls Dramatic Turnaround as EV Maker Powers Back to Exclusive Ranking
articles.author: TSLA
articles.excerpt: Elon Musk and Tesla are 'playing chess while other automakers are playing checkers,' a Wedbush analyst says.
articles.summary:
November wasn't very kind to Elon Musk.
The Tesla  (TSLA) - Get Free Report CEO had just completed his $44 billion acquisition of Twitter, an extremely public months-long saga of charges, countercharges and lots of bad karma.
Load Error

The seemingly endless drama prompted longtime bull Dan Ives of Wedbush to declare the Twitter takeover an "albatross" around Tesla's neck and boot the electric vehicle maker off his "Best Ideas" list.
"In what has been a dark comedy show with Twitter, Musk has essentially tarnished the Tesla story/stock and is starting to potentially impact the Tesla brand with this ongoing Twitter train wreck disaster," Ives wrote back on Nov.

articles.title: TESLA จมน้ำ 'คืนทุน' หรือ 'ซื้อรถให้ใหม่'
articles.excerpt: จากคลิป TikTok ช่อง J Just Drive เจ้าของศูนย์ซ่อมรถยนต์ Like a Car service โพสเล่าว่า มีรถยนต์ไฟฟ้า TESLA model 3 ขับตกน้ำและยกมาซ่อมที่ศูนย์ . จากข้อมูลที่เจ้า
articles.summary:
จากคลิป TikTok ช่อง J Just Drive เจ้าของศูนย์ซ่อมรถยนต์ Like a Car service โพสเล่าว่า มีรถยนต์ไฟฟ้า TESLA model 3 ขับตกน้ำและยกมาซ่อมที่ศูนย์
.
จากข้อมูลที่เจ้าของคลิปแจ้งเบื้องต้นคือ
1. แบตเตอรี่ TESLA model มีมูลค่า 600,000 บาท
2. ลองหาอะไหล่ดูแล้ว หายากมาก และถ้าสั่งก็ไม่รู้ว่าจะใช้เวลานานแค่ไหนกว่าจะได้
3. เจ้าของรถต้องการให้คืนทุนประกัน
4. ศูนย์ซ่อมก็เห็นด้วยและเสนอไปที่บริษัทประกันรออนุมัติ ในกรณีนี้ นอกจากการ 'คืนทุนประกัน' แล้ว ยังมีอีกตัวเลือกนึงที่น่าจะเป็นไปได้คือ 'เปลี่ยนรถยนต์ซึ่งมีสภาพเดียวกันแทน' หรือก็คือ 'ซื้อรถให้ใหม่'
จากคู่มือตีความประกันรถยนต์ โดย คปภ.

articles.title: GM договорилась с Tesla об использовании ее сети зарядных станций для электромобилей – Коммерсантъ
articles.author: Лента Новостей
articles.excerpt: Подробнее на сайте
articles.summary:
General Motors и Tesla 
договорились
 о партнерстве, которое предусматривает использование владельцами электромобилей GM сети станций быстрой зарядки Tesla Supercharger. О партнерстве было объявлено в четверг. 
 
Это также означает, что GM примет созданный Tesla стандарт разъема для зарядки электромобилей — NACS. В мае о подобном соглашении с Tesla объявил Ford. Тем самым три крупнейших игрока на американском рынке электромобилей приняли единый стандарт разъема и будут пользоваться одной сетью зарядных станций.

articles.title: EVs made by General Motors will be able to use Tesla's Supercharger network (NYSE:GM)
articles.author: Clark Schultz
articles.excerpt: General Motors (GM) announced a collaboration with Tesla to integrate the North American Charging Standard connector design into its electric vehicles beginning in 2025. Read more.
articles.summary:
Jag_cz
 
General Motors (
NYSE:
GM
) announced a 
collaboration
 with Tesla to integrate the North American Charging Standard connector design into its electric vehicles beginning in 2025.
 
The collaboration between the legacy Detroit auto powerhouse and Austin electric vehicle giant will expand access
 to charging for General Motors (
GM
) EV drivers at 12K Tesla Superchargers. The agreement is said to complement GM's ongoing investments in charging, as well as reinforce the focus on expanding charging access across home, workplace, and public spaces.

articles.title: In California, Tesla Model 3 Might Be Cheaper To Buy Than Toyota Camry
articles.author: Mark Kane
articles.excerpt: In California, the entry-level Tesla Model 3 RWD, which starts at $40,240, might be less expensive than the Toyota Camry ($26,320).
articles.summary:
Electric cars in California sell like hot cakes and this trend is not expected to change. In some cases, BEVs might be cheaper to buy than popular internal combustion engine cars.
 
Reuters
 recently noted that the entry-level 
Tesla Model 3
 RWD, which starts at $40,240, is less expensive than the Toyota Camry ($26,320) if you deduct the $7,500 federal tax credit as well as the California tax rebate.
 
The Tesla Model 3 (all versions) already qualifies for the full $7,500 federal tax credit
 (instead of just $3,750 previously), which was officially confirmed on the 
fueleconomy.

articles.title: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar red de carga de Tesla
articles.excerpt: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar red de carga de Tesla
articles.summary:
DETROIT (AP) — Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán utilizar gran parte de la extensa red de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año. Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, el enchufe que conecta un vehículo eléctrico a una estación de carga.
De esta forma, GM se une a Ford para que sus vehículos eléctricos funcionen con casi 12.000 de los aproximadamente 17.000 cargadores de Tesla, y ambas automotrices de Detroit están presionando para que el conector de Tesla sea el estándar de la industria.

articles.title: GM adota padrão de sistema de recarga de baterias da Tesla
articles.excerpt: Por David Shepardson e Joseph White (Reuters) - A General Motors se juntará à Ford na adoção do padrão de plugue de carregamento da Tesla, o que permitirá aos compradores de carros da montadora acesso…
articles.summary:
Por David Shepardson e Joseph White
 
(Reuters) - A General Motors se juntará à Ford na adoção do padrão de plugue de carregamento da Tesla, o que permitirá aos compradores de carros da montadora acesso à rede de recarregadores de baterias de carros elétricos Tesla Supercharger.
 
A iniciativa da GM, que segue uma decisão semelhante da Ford de adotar o plugue da Tesla, significa que três das principais montadoras de veículos elétricos dos Estados Unidos já concordaram com um padrão único para a conexão dos veículos a estações de recarga.

articles.title: Tesla Earmarks $5 Billion for Its Second European Gigafactory in Spain
articles.author: Cristian Agatie
articles.excerpt: Rumor has it that Tesla plans another gigafactory in Europe, with investments that could surpass 4.5 billion euros ($4.83 billion). The EV maker is in ta...
articles.summary:
Rumor has it that Tesla plans another gigafactory in Europe, with investments that could surpass 4.5 billion euros ($4.83 billion). The EV maker is in talks with the regional government of Valencia, although no official announcement was made.








 10 photos
Photo: AlexiBexi via YouTube | Edited
 Many people believe Tesla has a demand problem after it slashed prices for its four models in all markets. Still, the American 
EV
 maker is busy scouting places for new gigafactories, which contradicts the demand theory.

articles.title: GM vai adotar sistema de carregamento de carros elétricos da Tesla
articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.excerpt: Decisão segue acordo semelhante entre a montadora de Elon Musk e a Ford
articles.summary:
A General Motors vai se juntar à Ford ao adotar o padrão de carregamento norte-americano da 
Tesla
 e dar aos compradores de seus 
carros elétricos
 acesso à rede Tesla Supercharger, segundo acordo anunciado na quinta-feira (8).
 
A decisão, que 
segue um acordo semelhante da Ford
, significa que três dos principais vendedores de veículos elétricos no mercado norte-americano chegaram a um acordo para um padrão de hardware de carregamento. O acordo foi anunciado pela CEO da GM, Mary Barra, e pelo chefe da Tesla, Elon Musk, em um evento do Twitter Spaces.

articles.title: Tesla Pulls Dramatic Turnaround as EV Maker Powers Back to Exclusive Ranking
articles.author: Rob Lenihan
articles.excerpt: Elon Musk and Tesla are ‘playing chess while other automakers are playing checkers,' a Wedbush analyst says.
articles.summary:
November wasn't very kind to Elon Musk.

The Tesla (TSLA) - Get Free Report CEO had just completed his $44 billion acquisition of Twitter, an extremely public months-long saga of charges, countercharges and lots of bad karma.

The seemingly endless drama prompted longtime bull Dan Ives of Wedbush to declare the Twitter takeover an "albatross" around Tesla's neck and boot the electric vehicle maker off his "Best Ideas" list.

"In what has been a dark comedy show with Twitter, Musk has essentially tarnished the Tesla story/stock and is starting to potentially impact the Tesla brand with this ongoing Twitter train wreck disaster," Ives wrote back on Nov.

articles.title: How Tesla Stock Could Have Its Own ‘ChatGPT Moment'
articles.author: Al Root
articles.excerpt: Canaccord analyst George Gianarikas has an idea for a price reduction that investors would probably love.
articles.summary:
Not all price cuts are created equal.

Some create anxiety among investors about falling demand, increasing competition, and lower profit margins. But others have the ability to excite investors.

Canaccord analyst George Gianarikas sees a way for Tesla (ticker: TSLA) to cut prices that would probably fall into the excitement category.

The idea that a price cut could generate a positive buzz might feel like a stretch. Tesla stock fell some 10% when the company disclosed first-quarter results showing that profit margins fell more than expected year over year as a result of price reductions the electric-vehicle company had rolled out around the globe to boost demand.

articles.title: Cathie Wood comparte su opinión sobre la asociación de General Motors con Tesla
articles.author: Bolsa
articles.excerpt: Cathie Wood comparte su opinión sobre la asociación de General Motors con Tesla
articles.summary:
Invezz.com - Las acciones de General Motors Co (NYSE: NYSE: GM) subieron más del 5,0% esta mañana después de que el fabricante de automóviles heredado anunciara una asociación con Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: NASDAQ: TSLA).

Detalles del acuerdo Tesla-GM

El viernes, el fabricante de automóviles dijo que sus vehículos eléctricos pronto podrán utilizar la amplia red de unos 12.000 cargadores rápidos que Tesla ha instalado en América del Norte.

En 2025, GM también cambiará del puerto CCS (estándar actual de la industria) al estándar de carga norteamericano o 'NACS' que se encuentra en un Tesla.

articles.title: Elon Musk Announces Tesla Open To License Autopilot And Other Tesla Technologies
articles.author: Digvijay
articles.excerpt: Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla, one of the most well-known EV manufacturers. The tech billionaire appears eager to help his friends in the car business even more.
articles.summary:
It's easy to forget that Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla, one of the most well-known EV manufacturers in the business, in addition to tweeting out storms of erratic messages at all hours of the day. 
Following the revelation on May 25 that Ford customers would have access to Tesla's supercharging network, the tech billionaire appears eager to help his friends in the car business even more.
 
Here's what's going on:


 


"Tesla aspires to be as helpful as possible to other car companies," Musk tweeted on June 5.

articles.title: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar puestos de carga de Tesla
articles.author: Tom Krisher
articles.excerpt: Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según el acuerdo anunciado por las dos…
articles.summary:
DETROIT
 – Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según el acuerdo anunciado por las dos automotrices el jueves.
Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, la clavija que conecta un auto eléctrico a una estación de carga.
GM se une a Ford en los cambios en sus vehículos eléctricos para trabajar con unos 12.000 de los aproximadamente 17.000 cargadores de Tesla. Además, las dos automotrices de Detroit están presionando para convertir el conector de Tesla en el estándar de la industria.

articles.excerpt: Panasonic Holdings (PCRFY) has accelerated plans to expand production of electric vehicle batteries at a factory in Nevada jointly operated with Tesla (TSLA). Read more.

articles.title: Autos eléctricos de GM podrán usar puestos de carga de Tesla
articles.author: TOM KRISHER
articles.excerpt: Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según anuncian las automotrices
articles.summary:
En esta imagen de archivo, la directora general de General Motors, Mary Barra, interviene en el inicio de unas conversaciones contractuales con United Auto Workers, el 16 de julio de 2019, en Detroit. (AP Foto/Paul Sancya, archivo)
 
 
 
 
DETROIT — 
 
Los vehículos eléctricos fabricados por General Motors podrán emplear gran parte de la amplia red de puestos de carga de Tesla a partir del próximo año, según el acuerdo anunciado por las dos automotrices el jueves.
Además, GM adoptará el conector de Tesla, la clavija que conecta un auto eléctrico a una estación de carga.

articles.title: Tesla recalls nearly 140 Model Y EVs over serious steering wheel issue
articles.author: Business Standard
articles.excerpt: Elon Musk-run Tesla has recalled 137 Model Y electric vehicles (EVs) in the US in response to an issue with the fastener for the steering wheel.
articles.summary:
IANS
 San Francisco 
Your browser does not support the 
audio
 element.
1x
 Elon Musk-run Tesla has recalled 137 Model Y electric vehicles (EVs) in the US in response to an issue with the fastener for the steering wheel. 
 According to the US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's (NHTSA) safety recall report, 137 2022-2023 Tesla Model Y may possibly have a "loose" fastener that could cause disconnection of the steering wheel from its column.
 
 Tesla manufactured the recalled cars between June 23, 2022, and May 1, 2023, the report mentioned.

articles.title: Elon Musk Offers Rival Automakers Chance To License Autopilot/FSD and Other Tesla Tech
articles.author: Cristian Agatie
articles.excerpt: Many people thought Tesla could license its FSD Beta software to other car companies. Now, Elon Musk said he'd be happy to do it not only with FSD a...
articles.summary:
Many people thought Tesla could license its FSD Beta software to other car companies. Now, Elon Musk said he'd be happy to do it not only with FSD and Autopilot but also with other Tesla technologies. The remark was related to Mary Barra speaking about Tesla's lead in EV tech.








 8 photos
Photo: Tesla | Edited
 As stated many times by Elon Musk, Tesla's mission is to advance electric vehicles as a solution to global warming and air pollution. That's why those arguing that price cuts will hinder Tesla's image as a luxury carmaker are missing the point.

articles.title: Tesla Stock: This Is The Time To Get Out (Rating Downgrade) (NASDAQ:TSLA)
articles.author: The Asian Investor
articles.excerpt: After a 43% gain since April, I am closing out my position in Tesla stock. Recent TSLA deals with Ford and GM have led to upside momentum. Click here for more.
articles.summary:
jetcityimage/iStock Editorial via Getty Images
 
Tesla, Inc.
 (
NASDAQ:
TSLA
)'s shares have crossed into overbought territory recently, and investor sentiment has profoundly improved since 
I bought the fear
 during Tesla's large valuation draw-down in April. Most recently, Tesla has reported a
 couple of wins, including a partnership that will see Ford Motor Company (
F
) and General Motors Company (
GM
) join its Supercharger network. Additionally, data from the China Passenger Car Association indicates that Tesla is seeing an improving sales picture in China.

articles.title: ‘Slave ship': Black workers allege rampant racism at Tesla factory
articles.author: Janie Har
articles.excerpt: Factory workers in California described rampant racism and discrimination at the electric carmaker's plant, including frequent use of racial slurs and references to the manufacturing site as a…
articles.summary:
Tesla may face a class-action lawsuit after 240 black factory workers in California described rampant racism and discrimination at the electric automaker's San Francisco Bay Area plant, including frequent use of racial slurs and references to the manufacturing site as a plantation or slave ship.
The testimonies filed on Monday in Alameda County Superior Court comes from contractors and employees who worked on the production floor of the factory in Fremont, roughly 65 kilometres southeast of San Francisco.
